data.Name: Introduction
data.SubTitle: An introduction into playing BattleForge.
data.Description: The Skylord Moon will guide you through your first mission.
Goals: Learn how to utilize Skylord Powers

data.Name: Nightmare's End
data.SubTitle: The Shard's magic is too aggressive, you need to unlock the full power of the four elements to be able to destroy it.
data.Description: You need to unlock four magic nodes to get enough strength to destroy the Shard. The nodes are protected by magic barriers that can be removed by destroying the four power wells that feed them.

data.Name: The Dwarven Riddle
data.SubTitle: Unlock ancient secrets by destroying the right crystals before the enemies overwhelm you.
data.Description: To unlock the wisdom held in these magic crystals, you have to follow the right order in which they need to be destroyed. The enemies will be getting stronger every minute, you can unleash powerful fire rituals to destroy them, but at a price.

data.Name: The Insane God
data.SubTitle: Save the priests of the god of insects from their insane master and unleash ancient guardian spirits to destroy him.
data.Description: The insect god Urzach has been driven insane by the Twilight curse and has attacked his own temple. You need to protect his former priests and bring Urzach down. Use Urzachâ€™s old altars to aid you and keep Urzachâ€™s new minions from doing the same.

data.Name: Convoy
data.SubTitle: Support a convoy of Raven Walkers and break through the ranks of a Stonekin army
data.Description: QueekQueek's Raven Walkers will head through the central canyon to destroy the power shrine that blocks your way north. Support them with the Spell Devices in the canyon. Collect charges and control Elemental Crystals to unlock the power of the Spell Devices.

data.Name: Defending Hope
data.SubTitle: Defend the city Hope against a massive Twilight attack.
data.Description: The Skylords are gathering the mortals in the city Hope. The Twilight has picked up their scent and is closing in on all sides. Defend the town and the two soulstones, powerful and important relics.

data.Name: Sunbridge
data.SubTitle: Face an insane god on top of the most sacred place of this world.
data.Description: To defeat the infected god, you have to first destroy his two power shrines. Use the magical gate to direct the flow of the enemies, deciding which of you defends and who can attack. Switch it every few minutes by using the controllers near your first monument.

data.Name: The Treasure Fleet
data.SubTitle: There is a prize that will buy peace for the humans. It only needs to reach its destination ...
data.Description: Five of the massive gold transports from the giantâ€™s treasure are about to get on their way to the northeast, into human custody. Each wagon travels alone, make sure they reach their target location safely.

data.Name: Bad Harvest
data.SubTitle: Protect one piece of an unimaginable treasure and face the wrath of a giant.
data.Description: The humans have found one of the fabulous gold wagons the Red King stole from the giants. This wagon might be used as a bargaining chip for peace with the giants, but local bandits have different plans.

data.Name: King of the Giants
data.SubTitle: Help Rogan lure the king of the giants to Lyr. Face a lot of powerful Stonekin at the foot of the Giant Throne mountains.
data.Description: Rogan Kayle is luring the giant king Jorne to the human realm. Make sure to clear away all blockades on his way and look out for artifacts that might aid his quest.
Goals: Protect Rogan on his way to the North

data.Name: The Guns of Lyr
data.SubTitle: Restore the old defenses of Lyr and make a stand at the king's fortress, keeping back a massive Twilight attack.
data.Description: The goal is to defend the king in his fortress against a Twilight army. Two of you will stall the Twilight at the defense walls, while the other two will clean out the invasion camps inside the city. Two Engineers will reactivate Lyr's old defense cannons, you must clear the way for them.

data.Name: Mo
data.SubTitle: Guide the Juggernaut, Mo in his search for his friend, Twinaxe.
data.Description: You will control the White Juggernaut, Mo. Guide him on his search for his friend, Twinaxe, and keep him alive. Dodge Banzai Birds and lower bandit morale by destroying their patrols, lieutenants and gun positions. Taking out their Command Walker will break their morale.

data.Name: Blight
data.SubTitle: Free the mortal prisoners from the bandit garrison and be prepared for the unexpected.
data.Description: Bandits have taken some mortals of the southern tribes prisoner, theyâ€™re holding them in the central garrison. Free them by first destroying the surrounding bandit camps, then move to the central area to defeat their two leaders. Beware the leadersâ€™ countermagic auras, use an artifact in the central area to deactivate them.

data.Name: Siege of Hope
data.SubTitle: Break the siege around the first new human city.
data.Description: The Skylord Viridya has called for your help to free the city of Hope from a siege by creatures that seem to be affected by a strange new disease.

data.Name: Crusade
data.SubTitle: Defend the search expedition that has found a trace of the missing gods.
data.Description: Use the old teleporters to reach the human explorers. Defend the humans against the attacks coming from the north. Simultaneously, clear a path to the south, so reinforcements can reach your position.

data.Name: The Soultree
data.SubTitle: Viridyaâ€™s quest for the cure to the Twilight has reached its final stage as Skylords and Twilight clash in the fight over an ancient and dangerous artifact.
data.Description: Viridya seeks to protect the Soultree, a powerful Nature artifact, from the clutches of the Twilight. You have to work with the human defenders and hold off the Twilight.

data.Name: Behind Enemy Lines
data.SubTitle: A new religion is infecting its followers with the Twilight. Interrupt the transformation of the Twilight disciples before they turn into monsters.
data.Description: There is a new Twilight cult that willingly infects its followers with the Twilight curse with the goal to transform them into powerful creatures. Stop the cult disciples from infecting themselves by disrupting and destroying the Twilight infestations.

data.Name: Encounters with Twilight
data.SubTitle: Aid Rogan Kayle and a ragtag band of human refugees in their clash with an unknown evil.
data.Description: The Twilight has passed. The humans are returning to the surface and meet an unknown evil, a strange curse that seems to befall man and beast alike. As the mercenary Rogan Kayle calls up to the Skylords for help, you hear his plea.

data.Name: Nightmare Shard
data.SubTitle: Recover the Shard of the Forge that has crashed into the Shattered Lands.
data.Description: Reach the fragment of the Forge that has crashed into the Shattered Lands. Prevent the Witches of the Twilight from reaching it and destroy the remaining Twilight infestations. Watch out for wild magic spells that might randomly strike at some places.

data.Name: Passage to Darkness
data.SubTitle: Defeat all aspects of the Harbinger of the Lost Souls on the border to the land of the dead.
data.Description: The Harbinger is split into aspects of mortal, dragon and bestial souls. Destroy the five shrines of the Harbinger, each of the shrines destroyed keeps an aspect of the Harbinger in another part of Akylos from returning. Beware the wrath of the souls; only the strongest of you should bring it down on them.

data.Name: Empire
data.SubTitle: Fight in the past and in the present of Lyr to undo an invasion of the Lost Souls.
data.Description: The Lost Souls have opened portals through time and devastated the past of Lyr. Two Skylords will fight in the past to undo the damage, their success will restore defenses in the present. Meanwhile, two Skylords in the present must close the time portals of the Lost Souls. Rogan, Mo, Jorne and the Ragged King must reach and ignite the Cloudfire Beacon in the north to finally stop the invasion.

data.Name: Raven's End
data.SubTitle: Free the White Juggernaut Mo and assist him in the final clash with his arch enemy, Captain Blight.
data.Description: The Amii gates in this land can be used to your advantage. Reach the gate control devices and switch them to let the Stonekin attack the bandits and reroute the bandit battleships so they get destroyed by the Stonekin. Then claim all monuments to free Mo and assist in defeating Blight. Blight will teleport between the north and south, so better keep troops in the south as well.

data.Name: Ascension
data.SubTitle: Viridya's spirit is driving nature itself insane. Fight a nature goddess and protect the King of the Giants.
data.Description: Virdya's spirit is infecting nature with its rage. Keep her Avengers from leaving the Sanctum. Protect Jorne and defeat Viridya's minions in the Corrupted Forest. When Viridya has spent enough of her power, her inner demons will appear and can be defeated.
Goals: Map 1 - Viridya's Portals: Close the portals within the fortress and keep it free of enemies
Map 1 - Save Jorne: Jorne must survive
Map 2 - Stop Avengers to keep them from attacking other lands
Map 2 - (optional) pick up chests that aid players in other maps
Map 3 - Defeat the Portal Guardians: Defeat two portal guardians
Map 3 - Use the artifacts to close Viridya's portals

data.Name: Titans
data.SubTitle: A goddess of nature and a titan of fire clash near Lyr while Rogan lures the king of the giants there to decide the battle.
data.Description: The mortals forms of Brannoc and Viridya are fighting near Lyr. Protect the human civilians from their minions . Rogan lures the giant king there to decide the battle, clear a path for him.

data.Name: Slave Master
data.SubTitle: Use the battle between Twilight and bandits to your advantage and free tortured prisoners.
data.Description: Free the fire people from the clutches of the bandits in the north. Beware the invading Twilight and try to use their attacks to your advantage. Closing the magic gate near the twilight invasion teleporter can force the Twilight to only use flying creatures if you prefer this. Beware a group of Raven Battleships that are on patrol.
Goals: Fight your way through the Slavemaster's hideout
Do not let the Twilight reach the slave camp

data.Name: Ocean
data.SubTitle: Rescue Mo from Blight's approaching fleet in a race across several small islands.
data.Description: Mo is trapped in on the northern island and Blight's fleet is already attacking. Use the teleporters or the dropship to move along the islands to save Mo. Explore the sea to uncover valuable help.
Goals: Fight your way through to Mo
Prevent the Ravens from regaining control over the area

Image.Name: Fight at the End of the World

data.Name: Oracle
data.SubTitle: Assist Moon in performing as an ancient oracle and make a king.
data.Description: Moon wants to perform a fake prophecy that will install Mo as the leader of the fire tribes. Recover the sacred stone form the bandits to shape a statue. Then follow Moon's cues to perform some trick magic to convince the fire tribes.
